news.title: Anthropic Raises $30B at $380B Valuation
news.summary: Anthropic closed Series G funding led by GIC and Coatue, valuing the company at $380 billion. Run-rate revenue now $14B with 10x annual growth over three years.

news.title: AMD-Meta $100B AI Chip Deal
news.summary: Meta signed a multi-year agreement for six gigawatts of AMD AI processors, potentially owning 10% of AMD stock. Follows similar AMD-OpenAI deal.

news.title: Perplexity Launches Computer - Unified AI Agent Platform
news.summary: Perplexity announced 'Computer,' a new AI platform that 'reasons, delegates, searches, builds, remembers, codes, and delivers.' Currently available for Max subscribers.

news.title: Gemini Gets Multi-Step Task Capabilities on Mobile
news.summary: Google Gemini can now perform multi-step tasks on phones, starting with ordering food or rides. Represents push into agentic AI for mobile.

news.title: Google Flow AI Expands with Whisk and ImageFX Integration
news.summary: Google brings experimental Whisk and ImageFX AI image tools into Flow app, creating unified workspace to 'generate, edit and animate everything.'

news.title: Claude Opus 4.6 Released
news.summary: Anthropic upgraded their smartest model with major improvements in agentic coding, computer use, tool use, search, and finance tasks.

news.title: GGML and llama.cpp Join Hugging Face
news.summary: Major consolidation for local AI: GGML and llama.cpp projects join Hugging Face to 'ensure long-term progress of Local AI.'

news.title: Anthropic Consciousness Debate
news.summary: Anthropic describes Claude as 'a new kind of entity' that might be conscious, sparking philosophical and ethical debates about AI sentience.

news.title: Aletheia Tackles FirstProof Autonomously
news.summary: Google DeepMind mathematics research agent powered by Gemini 3 Deep Think autonomously solved 6/10 FirstProof challenge problems, demonstrating superhuman mathematical reasoning.

news.title: DEEPSYNTH: Benchmark for Deep Information Synthesis
news.summary: New benchmark evaluating LLM agents on realistic tasks requiring information gathering, synthesis, and structured reasoning. SOTA agents achieve only 8.97-17.5 F1.

news.title: UPipe: Memory-Efficient Context Parallelism via Headwise Chunking
news.summary: Achieves 87.5% memory reduction for 32B Transformers, supporting 5M token context on single 8xH100 node while matching training speed.

news.title: Prompt-Level Distillation: Non-Parametric Alternative to Fine-Tuning
news.summary: Extracts reasoning patterns into System Prompt instructions. Gemma-3 4B improved from 57% to 90% F1 on StereoSet with negligible latency.

news.title: Nemotron-Terminal: Data Engineering for LLM Terminal Capabilities
news.summary: NVIDIA releases Terminal-Task-Gen pipeline and Terminal-Corpus dataset. 32B model jumps from 3.4% to 27.4% on Terminal-Bench 2.0.

news.title: ADT Acquires Origin Wireless for AI-Powered Home Sensing
news.summary: Home security giant ADT acquired Origin Wireless, which uses Wi-Fi signals to detect where people and objects are in a home without cameras.

news.title: Nothing Phone 4A Launches in Blush Pink
news.summary: Nothing upcoming Phone 4A available in blush colorway with transparent chassis. Pink phone trend continues in Android market.

news.title: On LightSpray Cloudmonster 3 Hyper Launching Globally
news.summary: On revolutionary sneakers made with spray-on fibers getting global release. LightSpray technology creates upper in 3 minutes using robotic arm.

news.title: Epstein Files Released: Gates, Summers, Mandelson Named
news.summary: Millions of Epstein-related documents released by US Justice Department. Bill Gates 'took responsibility' in foundation staff meeting.

news.title: Trump 10% Worldwide Tariff Goes Into Effect
news.summary: President Trump new global tariff regime now active with baseline 10% tariff on imports. Direct impact on hardware imports and data center equipment.

news.title: Japan to Deploy Missiles on Island Near Taiwan by 2031
news.summary: Japan announced plans to deploy missiles on Yonaguni island, which lies on the frontlines of Taiwan tensions with China.

news.title: Australia Seals $300M AUKUS Sub Reactor Deal with UK
news.summary: Australia finalized defence deal with UK, committing $300 million for AUKUS submarine nuclear reactors.
